name: Senior Data Scientist (Graph ML)
description:
Clain is an international start-up. We build sophisticated analysis software that provides regulatory compliance for crypto related businesses and empower forensic investigators with ingenious tools to detect and explore crypto-enabled crimes

  • Come up with and test out hypotheses in Graph ML space
  • Develop new frameworks for the problems of classification and clustering of graph data
  • Planning and participating in experiments as well as interpreting the outcomes
  • Closely collaborate with the Data Science team
  • As a starter, to set up the right infrastructure for running scientific experiments

Requirements:

  • At least 3+ year hands-on experience working in Data Science
  • Good knowledge of Python, including experience working with ML and/or DL frameworks, C++/Rust
  • Experience working with GraphML, GNN and graph algorithms
  • You are comfortable working with BigData and graph structures containing several million nodes
  • You rolled out models in production environment and they worked.

You’ll get an edge if:

  • You’ve got academic degree in computer science
  • Have passion for crypto-economy and blockchain technology
